home.title: Take care of your health
home.subtitle: Schedule appointments with the best medical professionals.

page_not_found.title: Page not found
page_not_found.body: Sorry, the page you were looking for was not found.

forgot_password.title: Reset your password
forgot_password.subtitle: Please enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.

my_appointments.title: My appointments
my_appointments.no_appointments_title: You don't have any appointments yet
my_appointments.no_appointments_subtitle: You can go to the home page to schedule an appointment with the doctor you need

dialogs.start_chat_content: If you accept, you will start a conversation with the selected doctor. The chat will remain open for 15 days after the appointment.
dialogs.cancel_appointment_content: If you accept, the appointment will be canceled and the slot will be available for other users
dialogs.confirm_appointment_content: If you accept, the appointment will be confirmed

doctor.cancel_whole_day_content: If you accept, all appointments for the selected day will be canceled

my_messages.title: Messages
my_messages.no_messages_title: You don't have any messages yet

my_availabilities.title: My availabilities
my_availabilities.no_availabilities_subtitle: You can create a new one from the button
my_availabilities.no_availabilities_title: You don't have any availabilities yet

new_availability_page.title: Schedule a new availability
new_availability_page.available_range: Available ranges for the selected day and office are
new_availability_page.select_time_range: Please select a time within the available ranges
new_availability_page.select_frequency: Please, select the frequency (in minutes) with which you want to receive turns
new_availability_page.select_month: Please, select until which month you want the availability to be valid
new_availability_page.select_month_helper: Until this month (not inclusive) the selected availability will be valid

my_account.welcome_subtitle: Manage your appointments, your information and messages from here.

errors.generic_error: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again
